mapper.sql: id, ybjsh, zyh, cfh, cfnxh, yyxmbm, yyxmmc, ybxmbm, xmgg, xmdw, xmjx, xmdj, xmsl, xmje, hjrq, kdysxm, zxks, sfybxm, mcyl, sypc, yf, isupdate, barcode, zxts
